actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the amount of gain which may be excluded from gross income on the sale of the principal residence of an individual who has attained age 55 to compensate for the 50 percent increase since 1981 in the median price of a home in the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the one-time exclusion of gain from the sale of a principal residence by an individual who has attained age 55.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the amount of gain which may be excluded from gross income on the sale of the principal residence of an individual who has attained age 55 to compensate for the 50 percent increase since 1981 in the median price of a home in the United States.
